Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.rest.AdminController
@Path("/admin") @Produces("application/json") @Consumes("application/json") public class AdminController extends Object
Controller for administrative operations. Handles tasks such as approving owners, centers, and managing users.
Author:
team IOTA
